Package com.tangosol.application

Interface Context.ExtendedContext

All Superinterfaces:
Context
Enclosing interface:
Context
public static interface Context.ExtendedContext extends Context
Deprecated.
as of 12.2.1, left only for backward compatibility
The Context.ExtendedContext contains parameters that may be used for advanced creation and management of ConfigurableCacheFactory instances.
Author:
cf 2011.07.01
